title: Welcome to the House of Tea! <3
abstract: Join us to get things started and be part of our Pu'Er circles! <3
description:
Whether it's your first Congress or you're a "regular", the House of Tea welcomes you! Come to share the vibe, to browse the amazing tea, to drink a cup or two, to help your neighbors, and take part of something wonderful!

This first meeting is a good time to learn the basics of the functioning of the House of Tea and how to further participate in helping it run; or just to meet all the fantastic creatures who gravitate around it, and share some delicious tea!
